channel.title: Rongting on Rongting Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Rongting on Rongting Huang

item.description: I am a joint Postdoctoral Fellow at Stanford University (Brooke Howitt Lab) and Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center (Sizun Jiang Lab), specializing in single-cell genomics, cancer research, and spatial biology. ðŸŽ“ I earned my Ph.D. at The University of Hong Kong (HKU), where I worked in the StatBiomed Group under the supervision of Dr. Yuanhua Huang. My doctoral research focused on developing statistical methods to detect allele-specific somatic copy number variations from single-cell and spatial transcriptomic data, with the aim of elucidating genetic diversity in complex biological systems.
